body:
Thank you,

That seems to have worked.

I need to remember to use -u.

On 2/7/16, Andrew Gerrand <notifications@github.com> wrote:
> Actually, never mind the above. I think I the issue is related to
> Microsoft's Edge browser's implementation of the websocket protocol, and a
> possibly outdated version of the websocket package in your version of the
> tour.
>
> Can you please run
> ```
> go get -u golang.org/x/tour/gotour
> ```
> The `-u` flag is most important; it will make sure all the packages are
> updated to their most recent versions.
>
>
> ---
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub:
> https://github.com/golang/go/issues/14172#issuecomment-181168221
